mapper.select: SELECT oi.order_id, receiver, phone, address, address_detail, zip_code,msg, o.status, o.order_date, ANY_VALUE(i.name) as item_name, ANY_VALUE(ii.img_name) as img_url FROM `order` o INNER JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN item i ON oi.item_id = i.item_id INNER JOIN item_img ii ON oi.item_id = ii.item_id WHERE o.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY oi.order_id;
